Title: Love vs. Work
Plot: Upon learning that Avatar, Wildfire?s biggest rival, is one of Raintree?s new client?s horses and that Tina Sharp, Kris Furillo?s biggest rival, will be riding Avatar in the next big race, Kris and the Ritter family struggle to come to terms how to deal with having their biggest opponent train at Raintree.
GuestStars: Amy Jo Johnson, Charlotte Salt, Eric Winter
